div.p: LET THEM GO STAY IN THE WHITE HOUSE.
>> THEY SHOULD HAVE A CHANCE JUST LIKE EVERYBODY ELSE
THAT COMES TO AMERICA TO HAVE A CHANCE.
THEY COME FOR THE AMERICAN DREAM.
WE WANT TO LIVE UP TO WHAT WE ARE SAYING THEN WE SHOULD
ACCEPT THEM. >>> JOINING US FROM THE
MAYOR OF MURRIETA. STUFF ALONG THE SIDE OF YOU.
WHAT IS THAT TONIGHT, MAYOR? >> WELL, BILL, THEY THERE IS
STILL A CROWD OUT HERE.
WE HAVE TWO SIDES OF THE PROTEST.
THINGS ARE CALMED DOWN A BIT.
THERE IS NOT AS MANY PEOPLE AS THERE HAS BEEN IN THE
DAYS LEADING UP TO THIS. BUT THERE IS STILL A LOT OF
EMOTION. A STILL THE OF LOT OF
UNANSWERED QUESTIONS. THE TOWN, AGAIN, WE SORT OF
SEE THIS NATIONAL PROBLEM ON
OUR DOOR STEPS. AND THE COMMUNITY TO DATE
STILL HASN’T HAD A LOT OF ANSWERS.
>> OKAY. DID HOMELAND SECURITY CALL
YOU AND ALERT YOU THAT THEY WERE GOING TO BRING BUS
LOADS OF ILLEGALS FROM TEXAS
INTO YOUR TOWN? DID THEY GIVE YOU ANY HEADS
UP? >> NO, NO.
NEVER. IN FACT, WE CONFIRMED THIS
ON A A FRIDAY THAT THEY WOULD BE COMING ON THE
FOLLOWING TUESDAY. ONCE WE HAD THAT
INFORMATION, WE WANTED TO MAKE SURE WE HAD A PLAN IN
PLACE. WE KNEW THE MAGNITUDE OF
THIS. WE HAD ALREADY BEEN GETTING
CALLS AND CONCERNS AND QUESTIONS.
SO WE HAD COLLECTED ALL THE DATA AND INFORMATION OVER
THE WEEKEND AND WE DID THAT PRESS CONFERENCE ON MONDAY.
JUST TO ASSURE PEOPLE THAT MURRIETA IS GOING TO REMAIN
SAFE. THESE ARE THE FACTS AS WE
KNOW THEM AND TRY TO SKETCH RUMORS THAT WERE OUT THERE.
>> WHY DID THEY MURRIETA? >> THAT’S A GOOD QUESTION.
WE DON’T KNOW. COME TO FIND OUT APPARENTLY
THEY HAVE KNOWN ABOUT THIS PROBLEM FOR QUITE SOME TIME
AND WE HAVE DONE OUR RESEARCH PAUSE WE WEREN’T
GETTING A LOT OF ANSWERS. ONE OF WHICH HOW LONG DO WE
NEED TO SUSTAIN. THIS AFTER THE RESEARCH WE
HAVE DONE WE DIDN’T SEE HE THIS COMING TO AN END ANY
TIME SOON.
THAT’S WAS A BIG CONCERN TO US.
>> WHERE WERE THEY GOING TO PUT THE PEOPLE THEY WERE
BUSING INTO YOUR TOWN? WHERE WERE THEY GOING TO PUT
THEM. >> THERE IS A A FACILITY
HERE THAT’S BASICALLY A JAIL.
THAT WAS ANOTHER CONCERN. WE HE HAD SAFETY AND HEALTH
ISSUES THAT WE WANTED TO HAVE ANSWERS TOO.
THEY COULDN’T ANSWER THOSE. THIS IS DESIGNED TO BE A
JAIL. THESE KIDS, WOMEN, CHILDREN,
THEY ARE BEING TRANSPORTED ALL OVER THE COUNTRY.
COME TO FIND OUT THEY DIDN’T HAVE THE HEALTH SCREEN THEY
NEEDED. THEY DIDN’T GET THE CARE
THEY NEEDED. HE THEY WANTED TO COME HERE
AND SPEND THE NIGHT IN A JAIL FACILITY WHICH IS NO
PLACE, IT’S NOT EVEN HUMANE FOR PEOPLE TO DO THAT.
>> CHAOTIC SITUATION FEDERAL GOVERNMENT TO IMPOSE ON YOUR
TOWN. NOW, YOUR TOWN, ACCORDING TO
THE 2010 CENSUS 26% HISPANIC.
>> CORRECT. CAN YOU TELL ME HOW THE
HISPANIC COMMUNITY IN YET THAT IS REACTING TO ALL OF
THIS? >> WELL, EARLY ON IN OUR
CONFERENCE HEARING, WE ACTUALLY HAD HISPANICS THAT
WERE IMMIGRANTS THAT CAME UP AND THEY HAD CONCERNS, TOO.
THE SAME CONCERNS THAT EVERYONE ELSE HAS.
THAT IS THE IRONY OF THIS. I’M LISTENING TO BOTH SIDES
AND WHAT I’M HEARING IS SOMETHING VERY SIMILAR.
PEOPLE WANT A FAIR AND EFFICIENT PROCESS FOR
IMMIGRANTS TO COME OVER HERE.
THAT’S NOT BEING DONE. THE EFFICIENCY OF HOW THESE
PEOPLE ARE BEING TREATED IS INEFFECTIVE.
>> HAS YOUR COMMUNITY PITTED PEOPLE AGAINST EACH OTHER?
I’M SURE IF THERE ARE BOTH SIDES OF THE EQUATION HERE.
>> ABSOLUTELY. I DON’T THINK IT’S PEOPLE
MUR LET ATTACHMENT NATIONAL PROBLEM LIKE THIS SO
CONTROVERSIAL AND DROP TONIGHT DOORSTEP OF A
BEDROOM COMMUNITY. I THINK THERE ARE TWO SIDES.
IT DOES BECOME THIS ONE AGAINST THE OTHER.
WHAT WE NEED TO BE DOING IS COMING UP WITH SOLUTIONS
TOGETHER. >> OBVIOUSLY THE FEDERAL
GOVERNMENT HASN’T BEEN ABLE TO DO THAT FOR 40 YEARS.
NOW, IT’S A CATASTROPHE. THE SPITTING INCIDENT, THE
FAMOUS SPITTING INCIDENT THAT I JUST REFERRED TO IN
THE TALKING POINTS MEMO. THAT’S AGAINST THE LAW IN
YOUR TOWN. YOU CAN’T DO THAT TO
SOMEONE. WHAT HAS BEEN THE UPSHOT OF
THAT? >> YEAH.
OBVIOUSLY, THERE IS SOME BEHAVIOR THAT WE ARE NOT
ENDORSING AND IT’S NOT WELCOME IN OUR CITY.
NCHINGT, I JUST TALKED TO RIVERA JUST A MOMENT AGO AND
I OFFERED THAT THAT PERSON NEEDS TO BE FOUND AND
PROSECUTED. IT’S UNACCEPTABLE.
IT’S AN ASSAULT AND IT’S DEPLORABLE ACT IN OUR CITY.
WHAT DID RIVERA SAY? >> WE ARE GOING TO TALK A
LITTLE BIT LATER. IS HE INTERESTED IN MAKING
SURE JUSTICE IS SERVED.
>> ONCE IT GETS TO THAT LEVEL, THEN THE NEXT LEVEL
IS PHYSICAL VIOLENCE AND PUNCHING AND THEN, YOU KNOW,
YOU CAN’T HAVE THAT. IF YOU.
>> BILL, WE SAID FROM THE BEGINNING THAT WE WANTED TO
PROVIDE FOR THE SAFETY OF ALL.
YOU LISTEN TO THAT PRESS CONFERENCE, I WAS VERY
CLEAR. WE WANTED TO MAKE SURE THAT
EVERYONE REMAINED SAFE ON BOTH SIDES OF THE PROTEST
LINE AND EVERYONE WHO PASSES THROUGH THE CITY OF MUR LET
ATTACHMENT THAT WAS OUR PRIMARY MISSION.
>> I THINK YOU GUYS HAVE LARGELY ACCOMPLISHED THAT I
THINK YOU SHOULD BE PROUD OF YOUR TOWN, THE STATE POLICE
IN CALIFORNIA.
HAVE YOU KEPT A LID ON THE SITUATION.
BUT, THE FEDERAL GOVERNMENT, I MEAN, IT’S OUTRAGEOUS.
IF YOU HAD ACCESS TO PRESIDENT OBAMA, WHAT WOULD
YOU SAY TO HIM TONIGHT? >> I WOULD ASK HIM THE SAME
QUESTIONS THAT EVERYONE IS ASKING ME.
WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO? THIS IS A FEDERAL PROBLEM.
IT NEEDS TO BE ADDRESSED AT THE FEDERAL LEVEL.
ALL OF THIS OUT HERE WILL NOT FIX ANYTHING.
WHETHER THE BUSES COME OR DON’T COME, THE PROBLEM
STILL EXISTS AND THE PRESIDENT NEEDS TO ADDRESS
IT HEAD ON. GET TOGETHER WITH CONGRESS.
AND FIX IT ONCE AND FOR ALL. THESE ARE PEOPLE, THESE ARE
HUMAN BEINGS. >> THEY DON’T HAVE ANY PLAN
RIGHT NOW, MR. MAYOR. WE APPRECIATE YOU TAKING THE
TIME. IF YOU NEED ANYTHING FROM US
LET US KNOW. AGAIN, GOOD JOB.
WE ARE SORRY YOUR TOWN HAS TO GO THROUGH.
THIS DIRECTLY AHEAD, BRIT HUME WILL ANALYZE THE BORDER
MESS. ALSO WEIGHEN IN 00 ISIS
